slok:
ॐ तत्सदिति श्रीमद्भगवद्गीतासूपनिषत्सु
ब्रह्मविद्यायां योगशास्त्रे श्रीकृष्णार्जुनसंवादे
साङ्ख्ययोगो नाम द्वितीयोऽध्यायः ||२||
transliteration: OM tatsaditi śrīmadbhagavadgītāsūpaniṣatsu brahmavidyāyāṃ yogaśāstre śrīkṛṣṇārjunasaṃvāde sāṅkhyayogo nāma dvitīyo.adhyāyaḥ ||2-73||

siva.author: Swami Sivananda
siva.et: Swami Sivananda did not comment on this sloka
siva.ec: Swami Sivananda did not comment on this sloka
